Augment.Name: Regeneration
Augment.Description: This item is imbued with an undeniable goodness that slowly heals the wearer over time. Recovers 1 hp per minute.

Augment.Description: The additional spell point cost for using the Empower Metamagic feat is reduced by 2 SP.

Augment.Name: Blueshine
Augment.Description: This armor glistens with a blue-black sheen as if it were covered with an oily liquid sapphire. A suit of armor imbued with this property never tarnishes and is immune to acid damage and rusting effects. While wearing blueshine armor you gain a +3 competence bonus on Hide checks.

Augment.Description: This item causes those who strike the user to be overcome with terror, as from the Fear spell.

Augment.Name: Twilight

Augment.Description: This armor grants the wearer damage reduction of 5/magic.
